description: Detect faces, labels, logos, text and more in images.

blocks.name: detectFaces
blocks.description: Detects multiple faces within an image, along with the associated key facial attributes like emotional state or wearing headwear.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Google Developers Console.

args.name: image
args.info: Single image for analysis.

args.name: maxResults
args.info: Maximum results to return

args.name: minLatitude
args.info: Minimal latitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-90.0, +90.0].

args.name: minLongitude
args.info: Minimal longitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-180.0, +180.0].

args.name: maxLatitude
args.info: Maximal latitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-90.0, +90.0].

args.name: maxLongitude
args.info: Maximal longitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-180.0, +180.0].

args.info: The api key obtained from Google Developers Console.

args.info: Single image for analysis.

args.name: maxResults
args.info: Maximum results to return

args.name: minLatitude

args.name: minLongitude

args.name: maxLatitude
args.info: Maximal latitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-90.0, +90.0].

args.name: maxLongitude
args.info: Maximal longitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-180.0, +180.0].

blocks.name: detectText
blocks.description: Performs Optical Character Recognition. It detects and extracts text within an image, with support for a broad range of languages, along with support for automatic language identification.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Google Developers Console.

args.name: image
args.info: Single image for analysis.

args.name: languageHints
args.info: List of languages to use for text detection.

args.name: minLatitude
args.info: Minimal latitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-90.0, +90.0].

args.name: minLongitude
args.info: Minimal longitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-180.0, +180.0].

args.name: maxLatitude
args.info: Maximal latitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-90.0, +90.0].

args.name: maxLongitude
args.info: Maximal longitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-180.0, +180.0].

args.name: minLatitude

args.name: minLatitude
args.info: Minimal latitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-90.0, +90.0].

blocks.name: detectExplicitContent
blocks.description: Detects explicit content like adult content or violent content within an image.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Google Developers Console.

args.name: image
args.info: Single image for analysis.

args.name: minLatitude
args.info: Minimal latitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-90.0, +90.0].

args.name: minLongitude
args.info: Minimal longitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-180.0, +180.0].

args.name: maxLatitude
args.info: Maximal latitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-90.0, +90.0].

args.name: maxLongitude
args.info: Maximal longitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-180.0, +180.0].

args.name: apiKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Google Developers Console.

args.name: images
args.info: Several images for analysis.

args.name: type
args.info: One type of analysis. Possible values: faces|labels|landmarks|text|logos|imageproperties|explicitcontent.

args.name: maxResults
args.info: Maximum results to return (same for all requested pictures).

args.name: languageHints
args.info: List of languages to use for text detection. Applied only if 'text' type chosen

args.name: minLatitude
args.info: Minimal latitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-90.0, +90.0] (same for all requested pictures)..

args.name: minLongitude
args.info: Minimal longitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-180.0, +180.0] (same for all requested pictures)..

args.name: maxLatitude
args.info: Maximal latitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-90.0, +90.0] (same for all requested pictures)..

args.name: maxLongitude
args.info: Maximal longitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-180.0, +180.0] (same for all requested pictures)..

blocks.name: batchTypeDetections
blocks.description: Detects several properties for one image.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Google Developers Console.

args.name: image
args.info: One image for analysis.

args.name: types
args.info: Types of analysis. Possible values: faces, labels, landmarks, text, logos, imageproperties, explicitcontent.

args.name: maxResults
args.info: Maximum results to return

args.name: languageHints
args.info: List of languages to use for text detection. Applied only if 'text' type also chosen

args.name: minLatitude
args.info: Minimal latitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-90.0, +90.0].

args.name: minLongitude
args.info: Minimal longitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-180.0, +180.0].

args.name: maxLatitude
args.info: Maximal latitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-90.0, +90.0].

args.name: maxLongitude
args.info: Maximal longitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-180.0, +180.0].
